Key Match Events: Jrue Holiday scored 12 points in the first quarter on 5-of-6 shooting
Boston held Houston’s offense to just 36.4 percent shooting from the floor, including 27.8 percent from deep
Boston limited the Rockets to just 30 points in the paint for the game, which was 21.9 points below their season average
Post-Match Reflections: Mazzulla pointed out how much effort Holiday was giving, running back on defense
Mazzulla said of Kristaps Porzingis' defense in the second half: 'I thought his defense in the second half was tremendous'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kristaps Porzingis finished with 11 points, five rebounds, two assists, and two blocks and did an excellent job clogging the paint during Houston’s 30-point second half
Others: The hope is that Boston will be fully healthy by Sunday afternoon when they face their toughest challenge of the season: a road game against the 29-5 Oklahoma City Thunder, winners of 14 straight
